extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: ENCH 211 OR CHEM 211 OR ENCH 212 OR CHEM 212 OR ENCH 281 OR CHEM 281. Must also be registered in BSCE

basic.description: A survey of practical spectroscopic and spectrometric methods for the determination of the structures of organic and inorganic compounds. Methods will include nuclear magnetic resonance, electronic, infrared/Raman spectroscopy, and mass spectrometry. Tutorials will involve solving compound structures using spectroscopic data, and include an introduction to computational methods in spectroscopy.
basic.subject: ENCH
basic.title: Meth Struct Determination
